SNOW
SNOW ACCUMULATION AROUND AN INCH
COLD
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 13
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 3 BELOW

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
COLDER WITH LOWS AROUND 6 BELOW
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 11 BELOW

SUNNY, COLD WITH HIGHS AROUND 15
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 14 BELOW IN THE MORNING

MOSTLY CLEAR
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 3 ABOVE
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 6 BELOW

SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS AROUND 30
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH, BECOMING WEST IN THE AFTERNOON

LOWS AROUND ZERO
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S

LOWS ZERO TO 5 ABOVE ZERO

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND ZERO
HIGHS AROUND 20
